title: Safety Competency Enhancement Program for International Aid Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of international aid activities, awareness of local risk factors
context.additional_context: A blended learning course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields focusing on enhancing on-site safety. Conducts practice-centered learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Identify risk factors with 80% accuracy using a field risk assessment tool.
Successfully perform evacuation procedures in conflict zones three consecutive times via VR simulation.
Develop and present a four-stage response strategy in a team-based crisis management project.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
